catalog_script_client.name: Contact Number - Autopopulate.

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_b8dd94c293f33110d0ac703efaba1099
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="HR General Inquiry">c118d92d93777110d0ac703efaba1040</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:9b892d2193f77110d0ac703efaba10de</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Contact Number - Autopopulate.</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   if(control.name === 'requested_for') { //if the variable is requested for,when a name appears on that feild
	var contactNumberField = g_form.getControl('contact_number'); 
	var requestedForUser = g_form.getValue('requested_for');
	var contactNumber = getUserContactNumber(requestedForUser);

	contactNumberField.value = contactNumber;
   } 
   
}
function getUserContactNumber(userId){
	var userDetails = getUserDetailsbyId(userId);
	if(userDetails && userDetails.contact_number) {
		return userDetails.contact_number;
	} else {
		return 'contact number not available';
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-19 02:04:03</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b8dd94c293f33110d0ac703efaba1099</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Contact Number - Autopopulate.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_994488_hr">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b8dd94c293f33110d0ac703efaba1099</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-19 02:15:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
